features: 12-fluid ounces of Aveeno Skin Relief Fragrance-Free Moisturizing Body Lotion with a soothing triple oat and shea butter formula helps heal very dry skin and provides clinically proven relief for itchy, dry skin with 48-hour moisture

The dimethicone skin protectant with a soothing triple oat and hydrating shea butter formula, which includes oat flour, oat extract and oat oil, that provides soothing relief for itchy, dry skin and locks in long-lasting moisture
The non-greasy, non-comedogenic formula of this skin relief moisturizing lotion has been allergy tested and is specially formulated for sensitive skin and is free of fragrances, parabens and dyes
Gentle enough for use on sensitive skin, this unscented daily lotion is rich, yet fast-absorbing and helps heal itchy, very dry skin with 48-hour moisture
From the dermatologist-recommended skincare brand for over 70 years, Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep your skin looking healthy and feeling balanced
body.description: Product Description Aveeno Skin Relief Fragrance-Free Moisturizing Body Lotion is a rich, yet fast-absorbing lotion that helps heal and relieve very dry skin. Gentle enough for sensitive skin, the nourishing daily body lotion provides clinically proven soothing relief for itchy, dry skin with 48-hour moisture. This dimethicone skin protectant features a soothing Triple Oat and hydrating natural shea butter formula which includes oat flour, oat extract and oat oil that provides soothing relief for itchy, dry skin and locks in long-lasting moisture. Our fast-absorbing lotion is suitable for sensitive skin and has been allergy tested and is free of fragrances, parabens and dyes. Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep your skin looking healthy and feeling balanced. Experience all-day moisture and help heal very dry skin with this non-greasy, non-comedogenic body moisturizer, from the dermatologist-recommended skincare brand for over 70 years. Brand Story By Aveeno

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Oil Mist with Oat & Jojoba Oil for Dry Sensitive Skin Condition and nourish your skin with Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Oil Mist. Ideal for sensitive skin care, this body oil spray immediately moisturizes rough, dry skin; 92% of testers agree skin instantly looks smoother and more even after application. This moisturizing body oil spray is allergy tested, formulated for sensitive skin and free of parabens, silicones, mineral oil, and drying alcohol. From a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand for over 70 years, this daily moisturizing body oil is formulated with 98% naturally derived ingredients including oat oil, which is rich in lipids and fatty acids to help condition skin, and jojoba oil, which contains twice as much vitamin E as shea butter.

Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturizing Lotion for Very Dry Skin Aveeno Skin Relief Fragrance-Free Moisturizing Body Lotion is a rich, yet fast-absorbing lotion that helps heal and relieve very dry skin. Our fast-absorbing lotion is suitable for sensitive skin and has been allergy tested and is free of fragrances, parabens and dyes. This dimethicone skin protectant features a soothing Triple Oat and hydrating natural shea butter formula which includes oat flour, oat extract and oat oil that provides soothing relief for itchy, dry skin and locks in long-lasting moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Helps with dry chapped hands. I would purchase again & recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my skin is so soft now
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion! the smell isn’t great, it’s very subtly fragranced. you can’t really smell it once it’s on your skin. it works wonderfully!!! my skin went from dry and tight to moisturized and soft in maybe two uses. helps with the red bumps on the back of my arms as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was given a sample bottle from my Dermatologist to help with severe dry skin and cracked skin around the heals of both feet. With in a week my feet were felt soft and the skin was not dried out and the cracks were almost completely healed. I was so amazed by how fast my recovery time was that I purchased three 12 ounce bottles from Amazon. It is hard to find in the pharmacy and stores because it sells out fast. I recommend to anyone that suffers from dry skin or cracks in your heels to purchase this product. I also was empresses by the other body was soaps that Aveeno has. Aveeno this is the only skin lotion and body soap I use now. Never knew there was a difference in bath and body lotion’s until I started using Aveeno. Get some you will feel the effects right away .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion. I always put it on after every time I wash my hands. I wash my hands up to 30 times a day due to my job and how much I clean. It works great, but not as good as the stress relief Aveeno, which is thicker. Smells great and has okay texture. Would be better if it was a little thicker like the stress relief Aveeno, hence the 4 stars instead of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Aveeno lotion for a long time and my skin is super soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My coworker and I handle dirty papers all day and so we wash out hands a lot on top of that we live in a high desert meaning the air is dry. This lotion is our favorite by far that we've used.

Me encanta esta crema, mi piel ha tendido a ser muy seca y esta es la única crema que me la ha reparado. La textura de la crema es espesa pero al aplicarla en la piel no es nada grasosa y me la hidrata al 100% es mi 4to bote.
This Aveno cream is the best of the best leaves your sking so soft love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Aveeno Aveeno Active Naturals is such an amazing product! It takes away dry skin 24hours. Leaving your skin soft and moist.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is one of the best moisturiser suitable to be used on babies with atopic ...
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best moisturiser suitable to be used on babies with atopic dermatitis or dry skin..as its name describes,it actually soothes inflamed skin. No fragnance hence one of the best in market..once demerit is ,bcz its a very thick lotion,the pump is useless..one has to use the pump tube to remove the lotion from bottle..An excellent product worth the money. I hv bn using it on my baby ever since she developed allergy to johnson product.. it literally rescued her skin from damage.
